Literature.Title: Human lactoferricin derived di-peptides deploying loop structures induce apoptosis specifically in cancer cells through targeting membranous phosphatidylserine.
Literature.Author: Riedl S, Leber R, Rinner B, Schaider H, Lohner K, Zweytick D

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human dermal fibroblasts:LC50=13.9±0.4 µM,Human epidermal melanocytes:LC50=14.0±0.6 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human melanoma A375(LC50=9.3±0.8µM),Human Melanoma SBcl-2(LC50=9.4±0.5µM),Human metastatic melanoma WM164(90-100% Killing=20µM),Human rhabdomyosarcoma TE671(80-90% Killing=20µM),Human glioblastoma U251-MG(80-90% Killing=20µM)
